claim: Specifically, the framework assumes that the spread of COVID-19 follows the SEIR model and that the viral load in wastewater is solely contributed by the infected population as illustrated in the left panel of Figure 5.
title: Figure 5:
caption: The SEIR model and extended SEIR model used in the current literature.

claim:
Figure 5:

Open in a new tab
The SEIR model and extended SEIR model used in the current literature.Directly inferring the SEIR model from the viral load in wastewater may yield unstable results due to noisy viral fluctuations.
title: Figure 5:
caption: The SEIR model and extended SEIR model used in the current literature.

claim: To address this issue, Nourbakhsh el al. presented an extended SEIR model as illustrated in the right panel of Figure 5 (Nourbakhsh et al., 2022).
title: Figure 5:
caption: The SEIR model and extended SEIR model used in the current literature.
